attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Citizenship shoud be earned. There are too many people not doing enough for society. People who join the military to fight and possibly die for their nation for example and also police, fire service, hospital staff etc, people who have earned recognised achievements or jobs should earn citizenship and then qualify for better benifits, lower taxes possibly and better rates for on other parts on the econemy for their service to the nation. Citizenship will ultimitely lead to people striving to achieve more in life and for society.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
